section.name: UNIT 4: INTEGRATING THE SCIENTIFIC PRACTICES IN THE CLASSROOM
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 4: Integrating the Scientific Practices in the Classroom.

Now that you have a good understanding of the practices and how adults might use the practices in their daily lives, let's discuss ways you can integrate the scientific practices into your ABE/ASE lessons.

After completing this unit, you will be able to

  • identify classroom activities teachers can use for each of the scientific practices, and 
  • identify the use of scientific practices in the classroom.

Please allow approximately 60 minutes to complete this unit. However, you are free to leave the unit at any time. 

Select the Unit 4 link below to begin the lessons for this unit.
